why_choose: Why choose this course? Accounting skills to analyze business transactions Knowledge of core commerce domains Develop new business ideas Exposure to Digital Skills Leadership skills through co-curricular and extracurricular activities Industry exposure
what_learn: What you will learn? Understanding of core disciplines of commerce to support strategic decision-making Transform business ideas into value-generating enterprises Research and analytical skills for data-driven solutions Experience learning in a diverse environment Professional certifications from CISI-UK and CMA-USA NGO and Summer internship Embark on diverse career paths in fields such as accounting, finance, marketing, human resources, and more.

career: Career prospects Diverse careers across various sectors of the business world. Work in different designations such as financial analysts, accountants, marketing managers, human resource specialists Starting and managing business ventures. Pursuing postgraduate studies for career advancement in India or outside India. Pursuing roles in government agencies related to finance, commerce, and economic policy.
